official_title: A bill to amend title 35 of the United States Code to increase the effectiveness of the patent laws by providing protection to holders of United States patents from unfair foreign competition.

summary.text: Patent Invention Protection Act - Amends the patent laws to make it an infringement of patent to import into or sell in the United States without authority a product made in another country by a process patented in the United States. Makes it an infringement of patent to supply in the United States the material components of a patented invention for combination outside the United States, knowing that their combination in this country would constitute an infringement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 35 of the United States Code to increase the effectiveness of the patent laws by providing protection to holders of United States patents from unfair foreign competition.
